summary: An example script that trains NeMo speech enhancement models (audio‑to‑audio) using PyTorch Lightning. It supports multiple model categories (encoder‑decoder, predictive, score‑based generative), allows configuration via Hydra/CLI, and sets up data manifests and trainer parameters for CPU or GPU execution.
business_intent: Provide users with a ready‑to‑run reference for building and training speech denoising/ enhancement systems, enabling rapid experimentation and deployment of noise‑reduction models.
